manners.translation[0].definitions[0].de: polite ways of behaving in social situations
manners.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Her children all had such good manners.
It’s bad manners to talk with your mouth full  (=talk and eat at the same time).
Dad gave us a lecture about our table manners.
You mind your manners, young man!
‘Lesley just got up and left.’ ‘Some people have no manners.’
Good heavens, child, where are your manners?
manners.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the customs of a particular group of people
manners.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: a book about the life and manners of Victorian London
